name: Galleons
description:
This is a version of the game for my friends to use for testing purposes. It is setup for splitscreen mode since the game is designed to be multiplayer. I didn't spend a crazy amount of time on this, but am super happy about how the ships look when they are on fire / falling apart!

Controls - Player1, Player2
Exit - escape
Reset match - R
Fire cannons - right ctrl, E
Adjust cannons up/down - up/down arrows, W/S
Sail left/right - left/right arrows, a/d

Controls can be changed when launcing the unity app.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game is entirely physics based, and is inspired by the original "Galleon Wars" by wingman8 on Roblox.
